MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Old Colwyn, affecting properties in Maes Elian and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, via generator, by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40 am on 13th October, 2020.
